channel.title: Eline Kraaijenvanger - Humo on Terence Dores Cruz - PhD Candidate
channel.description: Recent content in Eline Kraaijenvanger - Humo on Terence Dores Cruz - PhD Candidate

item.title: Mensen zijn enorm geneigd roddels te geloven
item.description: Interview with Eline Kraaijenvanger about my work on how gossip and reputation in everyday can promote cooperation published on the website of Belgian magazine ‘Humo’.
